DocAttribute.Name: Identification
DocAttribute.Documentation:
An identifying designation given to a process or activity. It is the identifier at the occurrence level.
{ .change-ifc2x4} > IFC4 CHANGE Attribute promoted from subtypes.

DocAttribute.Name: LongDescription
IsPredecessorTo
DocAttribute.Documentation: Dependency between two activities, it refers to the subsequent activity for which this activity is the predecessor. The link between two activities can include a link type and a lag time.

DocAttribute.Name: IsSuccessorFrom
DocAttribute.Documentation: Dependency between two activities, it refers to the previous activity for which this activity is the successor. The link between two activities can include a link type and a lag time.

DocAttribute.Name: OperatesOn
DocAttribute.Documentation: Set of relationships to other objects, e.g. products, processes, controls, resources or actors, that are operated on by the process.
